<div style="text-align: justify"> 
My name is Pankaj Pansari. I'm a researcher in machine learning and combinatorial optimization. Previously, I was a Research Scientist at Naver Labs Europe in Grenoble, France. In the past, I've been a data analyst with General Electric in Bangalore, India.

I completed my PhD under Dr M. Pawan Kumar Mudigonda in the OVAL group at University of Oxford. I was an undergraduate student at the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur.
